name: The Ghostradio
description:
Interact and talk to the ghost haunting the radio. Find out how to chase him away:

Only with your voice!

Story:

A ghost haunts an old motel room. Your job is to scare away the ghost just by being polite and patient.

A notice:

Be polite  ;)

Ask the spirit questions and it will answer.

A simple game with fun and scary factor.

You have to speak english with the A.I.

Have fun!
